gui.walkietalkiemod.label: Walkie-Talkie
advancement.walkietalkiemod.root.title: Walkie Talkie
advancement.walkietalkiemod.root.descrip: Discover the power of communication with the walkie-talkie.
advancement.walkietalkiemod.wooden_walki: Obtained a wooden walkie-talkie, allowing you to communicate over short distances.
advancement.walkietalkiemod.stone_walkie: Obtained a stone walkie-talkie, allowing for greater communication range.
advancement.walkietalkiemod.iron_walkiet: Obtained an iron walkie-talkie, increasing communication range even further.
advancement.walkietalkiemod.diamond_walk: Obtained a top-of-the-line diamond walkie-talkie, allowing for seamless communication over great distances.
advancement.walkietalkiemod.netherite_wa: Obtained a state-of-the-art Netherite walkie-talkie, providing unprecedented communication range.
